concept.title: Interconnect Multiple S-Series VoIP PBXs
concept.shortdesc: In this section, we introduce how to interconnect 3 Yeastar S-Series VoIP PBXs. The 3 PBXs are located in different places. You can connect more Yeastar S-Series IPPBXs in the same way.

ul.li: Users in Branch A and Branch B can make internal calls.
Users in Branch A and the Headquarter can make internal calls.
Users in Branch B and the Headquarter can make internal calls.
